cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Spacious 8 bed mixed dorm room with 4 bunk beds and high quality mattresses. Each bed includes lockable locker, private reading light and power points. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 6 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: This is a female only dorm! Spacious 6 bed dorm room with 3 bunk beds and high quality mattresses. Each bed includes lockable locker, private reading light and power point. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: One bed in a 4 bed dorm room with 2 bunk beds and high quality mattresses. Each bed includes lockable locker, private reading light and power point. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

dorms.name: Superior 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: One bed in a spacious 4 bed dorm room with 2 bunk beds,  high quality mattresses, lockable locker, private reading light and power points. Partition between bunks for added privacy. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 9th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 9th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
